subject: Pedal plate
description_text:
[image: 74def24b-80be-48c4-91b2-99cfd73b6c54.jpg]

I ordered through amazon and I received the pedals, however the plate for
me to mount the pedals to which I need and paid for did not arrive with the
pedals.

amazon.com/dp/B0DJ29V2Z7?ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_fed_asin_title

This is the link to the pedals purchased and you can see the description is
Plus X-P2-H2-Plate and shows the imagery of the plate.

This is clearly linked to the Simsonn store page on amazon as well but when
I reached out to amazon they wanted to start a full return and refund
instead of just fixing the issue.

Provided in this email is a picture of everything that was in the box.

Thank you for your time,
Matthew

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7933 中
